channel.title: rstats on Zombdata
channel.description: Recent content in rstats on Zombdata

item.title: Active communities of zombie-lovers: Where are you?
item.description: The aim of this post if to provide a first glimpse into what Zombdata looks like. We will focus on describing the spatial location of the main sources of zombie-related material. The analysis here presented are updated every day! Where are the creators?
